clients.name: Grilled Deviled Chickens Under a Brick
emails: 4 baby chickens (poussins) or cornish hens (about 1 1/4 pounds each), or 4 chicken breast halves
1 tablespoon crushed red-pepper flakes, or to taste

clients.name: Stir-Fried Rice with Chinese Sausage
emails: 2 or 3 links of chineses sausage, cut into 1/4 inch slices
Finely chopped green onion or cilantro

clients.name: Five-Spice Chicken Wings Recipe
emails: 40 chicken wing pieces, or 20 whole chicken wings
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/3 to 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro leaves
1/4 cup light or regular sour cream
Juice 1/2 lemon (or why not try lime?)

clients.name: Chinese Pork Ribs
emails: 1.0 tbsp vinegar (you can use cider, malt or wine)

clients.name: Korean Rice Cakes (Dok Boki)
emails: 6 to 8 fresh long rice cake sticks, or 20 smaller rice cake sticks
3 to 4 tablespoons light soy sauce, depending on saltiness

clients.name: Dump Cake
emails: 1 box (about 18 oz.) yellow or white cake mix

clients.name: Sugar Cookies
emails: 2 1/2 cups self-rising white lily or cake flour

clients.name: Pretzel Dumplings With Creamed Chanterelle Mushrooms
emails: 1 tbsp butter for creamed chanterelle mushroom sauce
Salt and freshly ground black pepp

clients.name: Creamed Candy Corn
emails: 1 cup cream or half and half
